profile.about:
I am a cloud application architect, I am responsible for architecting, building and deploying, scalable, highly available, cloud-optimized application solutions that leverage AWS services in an agile and continuous integration/continuous deployment environment.

Prior to this, I was a software development lead at a consulting firm, where I built enterprise level web and mobile applications for digitally transforming the 8th principle of consumer protection in inclusive and responsible finance of “the smart campaign”: Mechanisms for Complaints Resolution.

In my spare time, I work on a serverless digital platform that aims to enable people in efficiently managing, developing and exposing their talent to the world by providing them with the right tools to do so efficiently and productively.

Skills: Serverless, AWS , Docker, Kubernetes, Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Typescript, NodeJS, PHP, Laravel, React.
